name: Hubbard Ave
description: A residential stretch of Hubbard Avenue, marked by an idling car. You are on Hubbard Ave. A car is parked on the side of the road, its engine idling, a silent sentinel in the quiet suburban afternoon. Hubbard Ave continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
